name: invoice-management-system
description: Comprehensive Invoice Management System with export, cloud sync, and analytics

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.migrate:deploy: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
